income.description: Annual income in NZD (synthetic values, clipped at 15,000 minimum)

region.description: Customer's regional location (North, South, East, West)

tenure_years.description: Number of years the customer has been with the company (exponential distribution)

received_campaign.description: Campaign exposure flag (1 = received, 0 = not received)

responded.description: Whether the customer responded to the campaign (1 = yes, 0 = no)

spend_last_month.description: Customer's spending amount in the previous month

spend_this_month.description: Customer's spending amount in the current month (after campaign)

channel.description: Channel through which the campaign was delivered (Email, SMS, Phone, App Notification)

product_category.description: Category of product offered (Loans, Credit Card, Savings, Insurance, None)

is_high_value.description: Flag indicating if the customer is high-value based on income and tenure (1 = yes, 0 = no)

days_since_last_purchase.description: Number of days since the customer's last purchase

credit_score.description: Synthetic credit score ranging between 300 and 850

customer_segment.description: Cluster segment assigned using KMeans on age and income
